General.Name: Shenzhen Zhongzhuang Construction Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Zhongzhuang Construction Group Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in architectural decoration construction and design services in China. The company engages in the design, construction, and property management of public buildings, such as shops, cultural, educational, sports and health facilities, and transportation infrastructure, as well as residential buildings, including ordinary houses and villas. It is also involved in new energy development and management; electricity and heat production and supply; industrial real estate planning; wholesale; internet technology; research and experimental development; and communication related businesses, as well as operates as a consultant. In addition, the company engages in the provision of software and information technology, energy management, and promotion and application, as well as environmental, mechanical, and electrical engineering technology services; and computer software and hardware development. Further, it offers building decoration materials, as well as thin film and photocatalyst products. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
